name: Supervisory Authority
definition: Independent public authority established by each EU Member State to monitor GDPR compliance
role: Monitor, enforce and facilitate GDPR compliance

name: Lead Supervisory Authority
definition: Supervisory authority of the Member State where the controller is established for cross-border processing
role: Primary enforcement body for cross-border cases

name: Data Protection Board
definition: European Data Protection Board formed by supervisory authorities from all Member States to ensure consistent application of GDPR
role: Promote and ensure consistent GDPR enforcement

name: Court of Justice
definition: European Court of Justice handling disputes and appeals related to GDPR enforcement
role: Judicial review and final authority on GDPR interpretation
